website_summaries.verdict: Great for customers seeking a helpful food log along with daily workout routines and weekly results.
pros: All-day fitness training and food logs available for daily measuring
Fitness planning and results located in weekly view format
cons: Not the best option for those wanting to track running or walking routines

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome as a gym planner and for meal tracking. If you are looking for a planner for running or cardio workouts, this planner is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Allen Rose

customer_reviews.title: I don't like to flip back and forth between apps - that ...
customer_reviews.text: This planner is EXACTLY what I was looking for!!! I've recently started a new heavy lifting workout plan, and this keeps me on track. I know exactly what I'm going to do each day, and I can quickly make any notations I want during my workout. While I use some apps for my workout, I don't like to flip back and forth between apps - that distracts me. Plus, it's much easier to flip back to my earlier workouts. I also wanted a planner that keeps track of my daily nutrition. Having both together lets me see exactly what may affect my workout (oh, yeah... that pizza last night). Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need for tracking workouts
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I can track my whole workout and cardio plus make comments with each workout! I like being able to track my nutrition as well and the bottom pages keep track of what day and week I am on. Love the accountability. Its nice to have a final week overview as well that lets you look back at how far you have come, not just seeing how far you still have to go. Definitely recommend getting this! Ive tried plenty of different planners/trackers and by far this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great blank formatted pages
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to get back in the habit of recording my workouts, but its a bit of a pain to format a completely blank journal for workout routines. A lot of the other exercise journals I saw had pre-formatted workout routines in them already. As a former personal fitness trainer, I did want a journal full of beginner workouts, but one that had blanks I could fill in myself. I am totally satisfied with this journal and will likely replace it with another one of the same once its full.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Today I received my journal; it is far bigger and more elegant than I expected. The 2-page spread/pagination is easy to read; in fact, I wanted to see my exercise and diet logs at the same time. Although I liked the Fitbook, this item has more room for me to make detailed notes. For the Saltwrap 2.0, I hope they add water icons perhaps at the top line by the Nutrition page. I think that would appeal to most customers. This is an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: ENPH

customer_reviews.title: It is really nice and I like the large format
customer_reviews.text: I hope this will help me lose the 25 lbs I am hoping for. It is really nice and I like the large format.
customer_reviews.author: mary f.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product with a top notch customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a planner where I could log my workouts, progress and other metrics. Salt Wrap came across and it seemed like the perfect product. Upon arrival the product felt great, hard cover, spiral spine and good paper quality. I had a minor issue in which I contacted the vendor/company and got a response and an unexpected answer to an issue I could of worked around no problem. I got a response in no time and they handled the issue in no time (literally minutes). This is the type of customer service that makes a customer for life! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: hugo a casahonda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these !!! Easy to use and lots of writing space. My personal trainer also loves it. It keeps all my workouts organized. I can even track my weight gain goals and overall progress. I can use it when I’m traveling, for when my personal trainer is not there. This is my 5th one. I can’t say it enough, I Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Face

customer_reviews.title: Best Fitness Planner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this fitness planner. Plenty of room to plan and log sets/circuits. The nutrition portion is great as well, although I use my phone to track this stuff. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: tia hoffert

customer_reviews.title: Streamlined
customer_reviews.text: Very simple, streamlines, and easy to use. It's nice to see a complete fitness planer that offers me all the essential means of tracking while letting me customize what I want to track. This has been a real game changer for me. I've used all kinds of apps and other planners that came with actual diet plans and such in them. I like that this one lets me put in my own plans and menus while still offering me enough ways to track the results that matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Mae

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy book with space for a variety of workout types.
customer_reviews.text: I received this just before leaving town for a vacation so I will begin using it this week. I prefer writing the specifics of my workouts in a workout journal as opposed to digital media and relying on devices such as fit bit,etc. I like the layout and the option to track my meals as well. The size and sturdiness of the spiral bound book make it feel like my writing journals and I love that, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, adaptable to individual use.
customer_reviews.text: Jan. 1 2019 was day 1 of new lifestyle, used planner along with a calorie app and a fitbit. Little excessive, but it helps me keep track of exactly what I'm doing without depending entirely on electronics. I'm more of a visual person, the planner is easy to go back several months to see what I was doing. So far I've lost 61 lbs, with (hopefully) another 80 to go. Use the planner to mark exercise, including daily steps taken. On my third planner with an extra one waiting in the wings. FYI, I'm a 60 year old female, with bad knees and a badly pronated foot. So...If I can do it, anyone can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will hold you more accountable than an app.
customer_reviews.text: I feel that the planner is easier to use than a fitness app. Also when your lifting you don’t need to be on your phone anyways. I like the fact you can look at nutrition and your workout all on the same two pages.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Clamhammer

customer_reviews.title: This is great & give I lots of space to write everything ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great & give I lots of space to write everything you need to write. I do wish it had a designated area to keep track of the water you drink, however, I will write it in space available on the top or bottom of the page.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Stone

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an anniversary present for my boyfriend, who has diligently been keeping his gym records (gains, goals, etc) in a spiral notebook for months! He had no idea I was researching fitness planners, but I researched EXTENSIVELY. It was a tough decision at first, but once I decided on Brendan's SaltWrap Fitness Planner, I was confident with my decision. It arrived EARLY(!) and when I unwrapped it, I was beyond happy with my selection! I will definitely be ordering from Brendan again! Awesome product and customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Back to basics.
customer_reviews.text: I've been used to planning my workouts and meals. I would use a notebook and wing it. Then came the apps. Tried it and didn't like it at all. Tried to get back to basics. Noticed this product and noticed how organized it was and in a format (print) that is much easier to reference. As with anything like this it's a matter of preference. If you decide to document your fitness, which is wise, this planner is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Is Intended For.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent daily fitness and nutrition planner, with end of the week check-in. The Training Log allows for 16-Weeks of plans, where specific details to general information can be recorded depending on individual fitness and nutrition goals. It does what it is intended for, a fitness and food tracker.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome planner
customer_reviews.text: This planner is by far the best one I have ever seen and used. It has both workout log and nutrition log with other awesome pages like milestone, notes, etc. It only contains around 16 or 17 weeks of logs but still the price is not bad if you want somebody to give you the log already rather than write stuff down and plan all by yourself. I’ll still purchase it after the current planner is finished.
customer_reviews.author: Jun Jie Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect planner for people's serious about fitness.
customer_reviews.text: I love this planet and have told everyone where they can buy it. It's perfect for my workouts as it goes up to 5 sets and 10 exercises. I will definitely be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ladnier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, straight forward, great quality and feel. So happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Raya Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of different ways to track fitness from apps to notebooks. I live in Japan and finding a decent logbook here is difficult. After browsing online I found the SaltWrap and I LOVE it. It's a big big, but I think it's a good thing as it will last. They shipped to Japan quickly, and I will def be stocking up during my next trip to the states. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only workout log you need
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for an old school log book for a while. Glad to have found this gem. Easy to use and plenty of room for workout logs. Stands up to being tossed around at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Fitness and Food tracker
customer_reviews.text: I have loved using this tracker and getting away from the apps! I love that I can do both my food and fitness planning and tracking with it! My only suggestion/complaint is that you can't buy extra pages to refill the book when you run out of pages, I feel like the book could be a little bit more economical in that way.
customer_reviews.author: j c

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husbands workout and weight gain tracking, and it has really helped him. He loves being able to track every detail from his days and keeping notes on what works.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitness/nutrition journal!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and haven't had a chance to use it yet but I know I'm going to enjoy tracking everything in this journal. I'm starting a weight lifting program and this will make it easy to keep track of weight, reps, sets etc. along with my nutrition for the day. Plenty of space to write everything out and nice layout for the eye. Well made and I'm excited to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoblu

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for those who want to fitness& nutrition side by side
customer_reviews.text: I’ve searched high and low and did a ton of research before buying a workout planner and THIS IS PERFECT! Love everything about it. Exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.author: Rhidiculous_fitness

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy well made daily fitness planner and daily food intake ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy well made daily fitness planner and daily food intake diary. The cover is much nicer than I expected. I like the pages do not have pre written dates so you can start on any date. This seems like a great way to easily review how what I've done or not done is reflected in the results. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great fitness planner. It has the right features for all the details I like to track. However, it is quite large. The size makes it very easy to jot details, but very heavy to lug back and forth to the gym. I will probably buy it again unless I find a smaller product with similar features.
customer_reviews.author: marialpettit

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t actually use this, but my partner does and he is in wonderful shape which I greatly appreciate, so 5 stars across the board!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Unruh

customer_reviews.title: Great workout tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for my daily routine. Keeping track of my workouts as well as nutrition, daily weights and lastly, the end of the week summary.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fitness journal so far
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the comprehensive explanations and guides. The journal is efficient and organized, while incorporating a lot of information. Really neat. The one issue I have is that it arrived sort of bowed, like the covers had been bend a bit. It isn't taking away from the usefulness, and I'll definitely be getting it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Fitness Planner, Inside and Out!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t have asked for a better Fitness Log! Was really surprised by the high quality cover, the layout and the good quality paper! I Love it! Will definitely be ordering a few more for the rest of the year!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Lopez

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome but you ain't gonna use it
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to write in it and has very clean and easy format to follow, but let's be real, you ain't gonna follow it...
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love having workout and nutrition side by side. I have MyFitnessPal but I prefer to have things written down because then I can easily see things in one spot. It's bigger than what I anticipated and doesn't have as many spaces for exercises as my previous gym journal but I can deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: NWiersma

customer_reviews.title: This is SERIOUSLY the BEST fitness planner I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased and used a lot of fitness planners. This one is simply the BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Compact nutrition/training log
customer_reviews.text: It was thoughtfully developed. To have nutrition tracking and training in one place is great. There's a place to encourage a weekly assessment. Great stuff. I have a long road ahead, and the planner covers 16 weeks, which breaks my goals into manageable segments.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitness tracker
customer_reviews.text: I like using this fitness tracker. And I can put my nutrition in it also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: accountability
customer_reviews.text: I brought this journal to help me keep track of my fitness journey. I think having an actual book will keep me more track. I like the size on the journal and there's plenty of space to write.
customer_reviews.author: JoCrews

customer_reviews.title: Keep track of goals and progress
customer_reviews.text: This contains everything needed to not only track your progress but to help see the goals you have set. Further, it includes a food journal. This is major part of what fitness is about. Now it can all be kept in on easy to use journal.
customer_reviews.author: ken lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the many various kinds of entries to help me organizes d track my fitness
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I could have asked for.
customer_reviews.text: Book is durable and easy to use. I enjoy it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts and nutrition tracking
customer_reviews.text: The lay out makes it easy to use and tracks lots of information. It seems very well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: stats and information i may not remember!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't started using yet as I have not started my diet but looking it over it has everything that I want and will track daily. It will help to see an over all picture of my progress as well as give me a good reference to what may not be working for me in a given time period so that I may adjust my workouts or eating plans.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen stockman

customer_reviews.title: Solid tracking book
customer_reviews.text: Just received the book and will start using it this week. I think it will be very helpful in staying on task for both workouts and food intake. Layout is a little off because the week sheet is after all the days of the week. Also no built in way to track water, but I can use meal 6 block for that option. Seems well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, well made.
customer_reviews.text: The planner came packaged very well. The planner is a Christmas gift for our daughter who is a fitness trainer and lifestyle coach We also purchased one for her boyfriend who is a cross fit trainer. Can’t wait to see what they think of them. Very well made and esthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Banks

customer_reviews.title: Great little journal
customer_reviews.text: Great journal to keep track of food and workouts. Easy, light, small and definitely user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Accountability and progress.
customer_reviews.text: This planner is absolutely great for maintaining awareness as your start your fitness regimen. It allows you to input your thoughts along side your schedule to mentally track your progress or lack there of. It's been a wonderful tool to keep myself accountable throughout the weeks. If you develop a relationship with this thing itll get you where you wanna go.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse J Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic planner⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic planner. I haven’t found a better layout yet! Well worth the little extra cash!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: A highly recommended part of my workout regime
customer_reviews.text: A highly recommended part of my workout regime... Grab one. It helps you organize and be game ready when walking into the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Capps

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again...
customer_reviews.text: Great way to keep up with my progress and monitor my eating. I get lazy with those b.s. iphone apps and what not. Great hard cover quality that I wasn't expecting that really makes it durable. All this needs is a fancy pen to go along with it and we're cooking with gas. Will Buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful!
customer_reviews.text: The organization is pleasing to the eye, and it’s user friendly. Very detailed sections for both fitness and nutrition, and they even have check in pages that pop up semi-weekly!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Moeser

customer_reviews.title: GET OFF YOUR PHONE.
customer_reviews.text: Its exciting to get back to the basics. When there is so much hoopla around the next life changing app on your phone. Do something even better for yourself. Get off your phone, grab a saltwrap fitness panner, through in some your favourite music (that not on your phone) and make your health goals a really.
customer_reviews.author: LP HOGUE

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Fitness and Nutrition Tracker
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this tracker as it was not full notebook size but it wasnt small either. I like the layout of the tracking pages and the setup of the sets/reps.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L

customer_reviews.title: Best fitness journal I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Fitness journal I have found. My 3 rd one. Plenty of room for notes, great layout for exercises and nutrition. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jeff pasley

customer_reviews.title: I refer to the  planner and it helps keeping me disciplined
customer_reviews.text: I loved that I can see what I am doing..I feel encouraged and the planner motivates me..in continuing on a good path!!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine J Campos

customer_reviews.title: Great For Fitness Fanatics!
customer_reviews.text: Last year we never did find a planner that gave us exctly what my son, the gym rat, wanted. But this one is the perfect fitness and nutrition log!
customer_reviews.author: L Renee Little

customer_reviews.title: Ideal fitness journal
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I’ve been looking for. Easy to use and allows me to track what I want. The summary and planning pages are useful tools. The quality of the journal will allow it to hold up to the abuse at the gym. I bought one for my son, too, after he saw mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bill

customer_reviews.title: My now and future tracking notebook.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Has all the info I care about tracking. If you dont track/do physical activity daily, or track nutrition daily, this may be too much for you. If you do, it's perfect. Weekly review and planner is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: NORMAN D.

customer_reviews.title: Pages out of sequence
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my Daily Fitness Planner since September 2019. I like it a lot and would definitely buy it again. However, when I reached week 12, page 208, I realized the numbering was out of sequence. The page after 208 was 215. I understand how this error can happen in printing and compiling. I have not contacted the seller for a replacement, but I will. I trust they can work with me to resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Dallo

customer_reviews.title: Best training/nutrition combo planner around.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Best planner I’ve found that combines training and nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Teo Beam

customer_reviews.title: Has everything!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fitness planner!! It has everything I will need to record my future successes and be able to track how I did it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Great for tracking progress!
customer_reviews.text: This planner is great, and I love the flexibility it affords to your workouts. I use it for everything from bodyweight exercises to lifting, and even to track climbing workouts. Definitely will buy again when I run out of pages!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pages are upside down
customer_reviews.text: Just received this in the mail. Unfortunately there are a few pages that were bound upside down. It’s not a huge problem, but if I’m paying twenty something dollars on a journal/planner, I expect it to be worth the money. A bit disappointed as I had read so many good reviews, but want to get started on my tracking now so not going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: A quality exercise and nutrition log!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a high quality ledger all around. A very detailed log for all of the daily aspects of exercise and nutrition. I use it everyday!!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Fitness logbook
customer_reviews.text: Great logbook to log all my fitness plans and goals. Makes it easy to keep track of my training program.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: One or 2 year calendar page in front of book would be nice
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked a blank page after every week for thoughts and journaling would be very helpful and a one page with whole 12 months so I can see 12 months on one page,very nice otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasurable Experience!
customer_reviews.text: Ordering and paying were simple and it was delivered in the specified time. I have gone through it and looks simple but helpful!

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. Hope my son likes it.

customer_reviews.title: probably the worst exercise journal I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Not very good for someone who wants to graph and track their progress
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love with this product! My husband and i have been using it for about a week to help keep track of our progress! Its wonderful if you like to see your strength increase over time!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome workout planner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a we'll put together planner. I bought it for my fiance who trains fighters, and he loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Too big, nice details.
customer_reviews.text: Nice details, not enough rep boxes, and WAY too big!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workout Journal.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. There is no wasted use of space. I definitely recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Fitness  planner
customer_reviews.text: This planner turned out to be the best thing I could have purchased to help me with my fitness goals. I will definitely be purchasing another. Thanks Saltwrap!!

customer_reviews.title: High quality fitness planner.
customer_reviews.text: Set up well and easy to use. Helps organize your fitness goals and track progress. Well constructed and good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Does what I needed to to do. Perfect for my fitness program a great tool.
customer_reviews.text: Salt wrap works great for me. Just what I was looking for to assist with recording my fitness and nutrition program.

customer_reviews.title: Make your journal part of your journey!!
customer_reviews.text: Live my fitness journals. They r my workout buddy!! Just started this journal (my 2nd). So far really like!!

customer_reviews.title: I love this fitness tracker
customer_reviews.text: I love this fitness tracker. I can keep track of my fitness, nutrition, weight, goals, etc... I also love the weekly wrap-up. I can plan out my next week with it.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Sturdy construction. Easy to track what you want and doesn't force you to wage through a bunch of stuff you don't need. Very satisfied!

customer_reviews.title: Great workout journal!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say: I love love love it. The size, durability & design are ideal for my gym use. I’m very happy with my purchase & would recommend to anyone.,

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third order. Helps me organize my workouts, track progress and meet fitness goals.

customer_reviews.title: Great size; layout is ideal!

customer_reviews.title: Great journal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for all my meetings and daily work notes -- I loved it so much I got a second for personal journaling -- i love that it lies flat on my desk and has a corner page holder! :)

customer_reviews.text: Just what I've been looking for. Perfect for logging workouts and meals
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: I can keep tabs on my meds as well and comments .
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Has everything i need to keep track of my well being on a 2 page journal per day instead of a journal for each. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: I liked that company has a website and link to help ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked that company has a website and link to help Learn how to fill out correctly. It also has a lot of space for work out information like reps etc. what I liked least was that it is a little bit intimidating for a beginner starting to work out. If included a sample page might be more helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Ann Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing planner!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband actually. He loves it! He’s able to keep log of work outs & nutrition. Simple and good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! Workout and nutrition pages to input my information.

customer_reviews.text: I liked how well it is to organize all of your workouts and nutrition plans

customer_reviews.title: Great format.
customer_reviews.text: I like the page set ups. The weekly accomplishments and goals really help me stay into it. I have a TBI, so keeping up with anything memory related is impossible. This is easy and keeps me motivated.

customer_reviews.title: Great training log book
customer_reviews.text: It has everything I need to keep track of my weight training and additional exercise such as running and swimming. It also has space for nutrition and weekly summarizes. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Hardcover book
customer_reviews.text: Big and I didn’t really that it was a hard cover book.

customer_reviews.text: I like the way it is organized and help with examples
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited to see the progress I make. "What gets measured... improves."
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Everything in one place
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time with apps because I can't see everything in one place. This is easy to use and I am able to see my whole day in one place. I love the amount of space to write. This is the fitness journal I've been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Spencer

customer_reviews.title: your fitness best friend.
customer_reviews.text: I the book. Has every section you would need. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: patricia godley

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The product came smashed. Quality book, but the binding is all bent and pages jacked up.
customer_reviews.author: carrie hartley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice easy to pack in your gym bag
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to have some sample exercises in the book just as a nice thing. Otherwise works perfect
customer_reviews.author: ChandlerRRC

customer_reviews.title: Format is well executed
customer_reviews.text: Format is well executed ; layout and copy was perfect for my training needs.
customer_reviews.author: LakeValleyLLC

product_meta.title: SaltWrap The Daily Fitness Planner - Gym Workout Log and Food Journal - with Daily and Weekly Pages, Goal Tracking Templates, Spiral-Bound, 7 x 10 inches
feature_bullets: ★ A SCIENTIFIC APPROACH TO ACCOMPLISHING YOUR FITNESS GOALS: Fitness planner, training log and food journal for accomplishing your fitness goals. Made for serious athletes, by serious athletes. See page layout and sample entries in the image section.
✅ DAILY WORKOUT LOG: The daily Training Log allows you to track all exercise activity, with a focus on resistance training or circuit-style training.
✅ DAILY FOOD LOG: Track as little or as much as you see fit. Spaces to track calories, macro-nutrients, meal timing and more.
✅ GOAL TRACKING: Set your goals. Then use the Goal Tracking Templates to hold yourself accountable. Track strength, performance and body composition goals in one visual snapshot.

✅ WEEKLY PLANNER: The Weekly Fitness Planner page is your designated fitness planning space. This allows you to make training and sound nutrition a priority—even if the rest of your life is hectic. The Weekly Check-In also asks you to rate your energy levels, joint health, and mindset each week. **The seller, SaltWrap, is solely responsible for all guarantees.
